casebody.data:
Lesley FOSTER and Ronald Foster, Appellants,
v.
PNC BANK, NATIONAL ASSOCIATION as Successor by Merger to National City Bank, as Successor by Merger to National City Mortgage Co., Appellee. No. 4D16-3284 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Fourth District. [December 21, 2017]

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
